attributes.action: Tougher jail sentence for pedophiles, removal witness protection for pedophiles
attributes.additional_details:
There needs to be a shake up of reform within the justice system and CPS, with the systemic police protection of suspected Pedophiles and convicted Pedophiles.

No one is defending our helpless children and now is time for change, we need police protection for our children not the protection of people who sort to humiliate, abuse and ruin the lives of thousands of helpless children.
attributes.background: Increase of sentence terms, removal of witness protection from the police in relation to suspected pedophiles and the removal of slander law protection when evidence of child abuse communications has been submitted to police, remove relocation and protection of pedophiles rights
